name: Dark Alchemy
description:
Dark Alchemy is a puzzle / horror experience where only your own mistakes will make things scarier !

Focus on your work, overcome your fear, and become a true Alchemist.

This game is available for free download - or pay what you want if you wish to support my work !

_______________________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS :

Move : Z,Q,S,D or Arrow Keys.

Interact : Left Click.

_______________________________________________________________________________________
